author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
> EOFCREATE the subcontainer pointed to by initcontainer_index must have its len(data_section) equal data_size, i.e. data section content is exactly as the size declared in the header (see Data section lifecycle)

Equal to the data_size from the subcontainer, right?

 ./eofdump eofdump --hex 0xef0001010004020001000c03000100160400000000800004600060ff60006000ec005000ef000101000402000100010400030000800000feaabb

I don't really know why this tests should fail

author: _shemnon
content: Your eofdump shows `aabb30` but the supplied stream ends with `aabb` - somehow 30 is being added

author: _shemnon
content: It's part of the result from the first dump, second dump has bad data
